title: Waving Hands
summary:
This short video features three young men in an indoor, well-lit setting.

**Key Objects:**
*   The background includes a white tiled ceiling with square light panels, a plain grey wall, and large windows on the right side that let in bright sunlight, creating some backlighting.
*   Clothing worn by the individuals includes a black zip-up jacket, a dark top, and a red puffer jacket. One person also wears glasses.

**Key People:**
*   The central figure is a young East Asian male with dark, wavy hair.
*   To his right is another young male with curly dark hair, who appears to be Middle Eastern or South Asian.
*   A third young East Asian male, wearing glasses, appears on the left side of the frame later in the clip.

**Key Actions:**
*   At the beginning of the video, the central male waves his right hand towards the camera and his mouth moves as if speaking (no audio).
*   He then lowers his hand and looks directly at the camera.
*   Around the 0:07 mark, the third male slides into the left side of the frame.
